akas: Josh Gates' Destination Truth USA (long title)
akas from release info: Josh Gates' Destination Truth USA (long title)

1.title: Vietnam's Bigfoot
1.plot: The Destination Truth team undertakes a groundbreaking expedition to South East Asia, traveling deep into uncharted wilderness and pushing the limit on a daring quest for Vietnam's Bigfoot.

2.title: Return to the Haunted Forest/Belize Goblin
2.plot: Josh's former cameraman, Evan, returns two years later to the woods where he believes he was assaulted by an angry, dark spirit. The forest may have something waiting for him again.

3.title: Ghosts of Cannibal Village/Kapre
3.plot: Josh and his team journey across Fiji looking for the ghosts of men devoured by a former cannibal tribe. Josh finds that the former cannibal village has turned into a paranormal nightmare.

4.title: Alien Invaders/Swedish Lake Monster
4.plot: Josh and his team traverse across Kazakhstan to investigate sightings of a crashed alien spacecraft and a potential government cover-up.

5.title: Spirits of Tikal/Creature From the Black Lagoon
5.plot: Josh investigates the reportedly haunted remains of the Mayan city of Tikal. In one of the world's most spectacular ruins, the team dares to come face to face with the ghosts of sacrificial victims.

6.title: Vampire Monsters/Island of the Damned
6.plot: The team travels to Romania to investigate reports of a real-life vampire monster. In the back woods of Transylvania, the team has a run-in with something lurking in the forest.

7.title: Hanging Coffins/Kazakh Monster
7.plot: Josh leads a perilous road trip across the Philippines and braves the dangerous wilderness, searching for paranormal activity in hanging coffins. In this death-defying investigation, Josh makes one of the most shocking paranormal discoveries in DT history. Then, the search of Central Asia's Bigfoot brings the team to Kazakhstan. Climbing along sheer cliffs and searching traditional villages for answers, the truth behind the legend may be closer than they think.

1.title: Ri/Iguanodon
1.plot: Josh and team search the Papua New Guinea coast for a mermaid locals call the Ri, and then hunt for a creature said to resemble an Iguanodon near the village of Tinganavudu.

2.title: Haunted Village/Naga
2.plot: The Team travels to Thailand to investigate claims of a haunted village. The Team then visits the Thailand-Laos border to search the Mekong River for the legendary sea-serpent Phaya Naga.

3.title: Ropen/Chupacabra
3.plot: First, Josh and team search Papua New Guinea for The Ropen, a creature locals claim resembles a Pterodactyl. Then, The Team travels to Chile to search for the legendary Chupacabra.

4.title: Bigfoot/Nahuelito
4.plot: Josh and team investigate sightings of Bigfoot in Malaysia's Endau Rompin National Park. The team then travels to Argentina to search the Nahuel Huapi Lake for the Nahuelito, the Argentine equivalent of the Loch Ness Monster.

5.title: Mamlambo/Tokoloshe
5.plot: The team heads to South Africa to search the Mzintlava River for the Mamlambo, a water-dwelling creature said to have the head of a horse. The team then enters Lesotho to hunt the Tokoloshe, a ape-like creature said to vanish like a ghost.

6.title: El Lobizon/El Pombero
6.plot: Josh and his team search a small town in Argentina for evidence of El Lobizon, the Argentine version of the werewolf. Next, they hunt down El Pombero, a small creature that can reportedly impregnate woman with one touch on the stomach.

1.title: Yeti
1.plot: Josh takes a band-new team to Nepal were they brave extreme temperatures and heights to search Mount Everest for the world-famous Yeti.

2.title: Haunted Island & Devil Worm
2.plot: The team travels to Africa to investigate reports of hauntings by former slaves on the island of Pemba. Then the team travels to the Gobi Desert to find the Mongolian Death Worm, a large creature that spits acid and emit electricity.

3.title: Wild Man & Swamp Dinosaur
3.plot: Josh and team search for a wild ape-man in the Cambodian jungle. Then they search the swamps of Lake Bangweulu in Zambia for dinosaur called the Mokèlé-mbèmbé.

4.title: Tarasque/Popobawa
4.plot: The team travels to Vietnam and searches Halong Bay for a sea-serpent called the Tarasque. The team then travels to Zanzibar to find the Popobawa, a large bat-like creature that attacks locals at night.

5.title: Flying Dinosaur & Sloth Monster
5.plot: Josh takes the team to the Amazon Rainforest to find the Mapinguary, a giant sloth with a second mouth on it's stomach. Then the team hunts down the Kongomato, a Pterodactyl-like creature from Zambia.

6.title: Giant Anaconda
6.plot: Josh and his team search the banks of the Amazon River for anacondas that are reportedly more than 60 feet in length.

7.title: The Yowie & Haunted Mosque
7.plot: Josh and his team search Australia's Blue Mountians for the Yowie, Australia's version of Bigfoot. Then the team investigates hauntings at an abandoned mosque in Malaysia.

8.title: Orang Pendek & Worm Monster
8.plot: The Team searches for the Orang Pendek, a small ape-like creature, on the island of Sumatra, Indonesia. Then, the Team heads to Lagarfljót Lake in Iceland to search for a large lake-dwelling worm.

9.title: Haunted Cave & Burrunjor
9.plot: The Team investigates a cave in Indonesia that locals claim is haunted. Josh and team then travel to Australia to hunt down the Burrunjor, a 25-foot long lizard that locals claim has been devouring cattle.

10.title: Ahool & Pinatubo
10.plot: Josh and team search the Island of Java for the Ahool, a bat with a 12-foot wingspan. Then the Team faces numerous obstacles in their hunt for the Pinatubo, a large water-dwelling creature said to inhabit the rain forests of the Philippines.

11.title: Aswang & Haunted Forest
11.plot: The Team searches for the Aswang, ghostly creatures said to haunted a tree in the Phillipines. Then the Team investigates ghost sightings in Japan's Aokigahara Forest, the site of nearly 1,000 reported suicides.

12.title: Issie & Icelandic Elves
12.plot: The Team searches Lake Ikeda in Kyushu, Japan for Issie, Japan's version of the Loch Ness Monster. The Team then searches for mischievous elves in Iceland.

13.title: Ninki Nanka & Kikiyaon
13.plot: Josh and team search The Gambia for two creatures at once: The Ninki Nanka, a large dragon-like lizard, and the Kikiyaon, a large owl-like creature.

1.title: Haunted Forest/Alux
1.plot: With a brand new team, Josh heads to Romania to investigate hauntings in the Hoia Baciu Forest. Then, the team is off to Mexico to find the Alux, a goblin from the Yucatán state.

2.title: Island of the Dolls/Lusca
2.plot: Josh takes the team to Mexico to investigate an island filled with possessed dolls. Then, the Team hunts the Lusca, a giant octopus that inhabits underwater tunnels in The Bahamas.

3.title: King Tut's Curse/Swamp Ape
3.plot: The Team conducts the first ever over-night investigation inside the tomb of Egyptian Pharoah Tutankhamun. Then, the team travels to the Florida Everglades to investigate a Ape-like creature in the swamps.

4.title: Ghosts of Chernobyl/Sal'awa
4.plot: The Team conducts the first paranormal investigation at the site of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster. Then, Josh and team search Egypt for the Sal'awa, the Egyptian version of the Werewolf, who locals claim has attacked children.

5.title: Alien Monsters/Lake Van Monster
5.plot: The Team travels to Chile to investigate claims of Aliens and UFOs. Then, the Team searches Lake Van in Turkey for a creature resembling a dinosaur.

6.title: Chullachaqui/Bermuda Triangle
6.plot: The Team searches Peru for the devil known as the Chullachqui, with Ghost Hunters International stars Robb Demarest and Dustin Pari. Then the Team investigates the Bermuda Triangle.

7.title: Haunted Lost City/Thunderbird
7.plot: Josh and team investigate ghost sightings in an Incan village in Peru. Then the Team searches Manokotak, Alaska for a giant bird said to emit electricity from its wings.

8.title: Werewolf/Arica Monster
8.plot: The Team heads to Transylvania to hunt for the legendary Werewolf. Then, Josh leads the team in search of a Velociraptor in Arica, Chile.

9.title: The Bhutan Yeti
9.plot: Josh Gates conducts his second search for the world-famous Yeti, this time bringing his team to the Himalayan Mountains of Bhutan.

10.title: Ghosts of Masada/The Leprechaun
10.plot: New and old team members return to Destination Truth, as Josh searches for ghosts at Masada, the historical site of a mass suicide. Then, the team hunts down Leprechauns in Doolin, Ireland.

11.title: Ghosts of the Great Wall/Israeli Mermaid
11.plot: The Team investigates ghost sightings along the Great Wall of China. Then, Josh and team search for a mermaid and $1,000,000 reward off the coast of Kiryat Yam, Israel.

12.title: The Jersey Devil/The Yeren
12.plot: The Team welcomes Ghost Hunters star Kris Williams as they search Wharton State Forest for the infamous Jersey Devil. The Team then searches for the Yeren, China's version of Bigfoot, in Hubei.

13.title: Haunted Mining Town/The Taniwha
13.plot: The Team welcomes Warehouse 13 star Allison Scagliotti as they investigate hauntings in Humberstone and LaNoria in Chile. The Team then Searches the coast of Rotorua, New Zealand for an eel-monster known as the Taniwha.

14.title: Ghost of Petra/The Lizard Man
14.plot: Josh and team search for ghosts in the ancient city of Petra, Jordan. The Team then travels to Bishopville, South Carolina to hunt down the Lizard Man of Scape Ore Swamp.

15.title: Spirits of Easter Island/The Moa
15.plot: Josh and the team hunt for spirits that have attached themselves to the Moai statues on Easter Island. Then, the team investigates sightings of the extinct Giant Moa on South Island, New Zealand.

1.title: Poltergeists of Pompeii/Nandi Beast
1.plot: New faces join The Team as Josh investigates claims of lingering spirits at the unearthed ruins of Pompeii, Italy. The Team then searches the Kenyan bush for the Nandi Bear, a creature said to eat human brains.

2.title: Spirits of Angkor Wat/Canadian Lake Monster
2.plot: The Team investigate claims of paranormal activity in Cambodia's ancient Angkor Wat temple. Then, Josh and team search Canada's Okanagan Lake for a water-dwelling serpent called the Ogopogo.

3.title: Ghosts of Haboro/Mngwa
3.plot: Josh and the team travel to Haboro, Japan, an abandoned mining town on the northern island of Hokkaido. Rotting vestiges are all that remain as they check out the alleged home of the ghostly miners. Next, they head to Tanzania, where tribal warriors fear the mysterious "Mingwa" beast, an elusive creature believed to possess a most deadly combination of predatory skills.

4.title: Ghost Fleet/Japanese River Monster
4.plot: On this episode of Destination Truth, Josh and the team travel to Micronesia in what will be the world's first underwater paranormal investigation. Next, the crew heads to Tono, Japan to seek out the elusive "Kappa," a mythical sea monster that is both feared and revered among townspeople.

5.title: Siberian Snowman
5.plot: On this episode of Destination Truth, Josh and the team traverse the globe to investigate the famed Siberian Snowman -- better known as "Bigfoot."

6.title: Ghosts of Menengai Crater/Kalanoro
6.plot: The Destination Truth team journeys to East Africa to investigate the Menengai Crater. According to legend, the spirits of 60,000 warriors killed in battle roam the area, terrorizing intruders including the local Maasai tribe. Next, the team crosses the Indian Ocean to seek out the illustrious Kalanoro beast of Madagascar.

7.title: Haunted Island Ruins/Moroccan Succubus
7.plot: This week, Josh and the Destination Truth crew check out the ancient Nan Madol ruins of Pohnpei Island, Micronesia. Formerly a place of worship, the site is both feared and revered. Next, team Truth ventures to Morocco in search of Aisha Kandisha. This vexing vixen is best known for her killer looks -- literally!

8.title: Guam Zombies/Fangalobolo
8.plot: On this week's Destination Truth, Josh and the team journey to Madagascar in search of the famed Fangalobolo beast. Deemed a deadly predator, this alleged monster bat has incited national frenzy. Next, Team Truth's Guam excursion leads them straight for trouble. In hopes of observing the feared Taotaomo'na spirits, the crew begins their mission near the territory's resident Latte Stones -- precisely where the zombie-like ghosts are said to materialize.

9.title: Live from Ireland: The Search for the Banshee Ghost
9.plot: In the very first live broadcast of Destination Truth, Josh Gates and his Truth Team set out to find the "Irish angel of death," better known as the banshee.

10.title: Haunted Island Prison/Ucumar
10.plot: The team treks to Argentina to seek out the mysterious Ucumar beast.

11.title: Sandstorm Spirits/Cerro Azul Monster
11.plot: Disembodied spirits in a deserted Namibian mining town challenge Josh and the team.

12.title: Jungle Temple Ghosts/Namibian Night Stalker
12.plot: The team races across Thailand to chase recent sightings of a giant ghost.

13.title: Thai Tree People/Aiya Napa Monster
13.plot: Josh and the crew head to Cyprus to investigate a massive sea creature.

14.title: Ghosts of Antarctica
14.plot: In a Destination Truth first, the team will trek to Antarctica, where strange phenomena occurring around abandoned research stations has stumped scientists.

-1.title: Sea Monster/Bat Demon
-1.plot: Josh heads to Vietnam where a sea monster is said to lurk under the waters of Halong Bay.

imdb.title: Destination Truth
plot: A globe-trekking reality show that follows Josh Gates around the world as he explores different sites of supernatural import.::Anonymous
